name: The Primordial Maze
description:
The Primordial Maze - From a point beyond space and time, two primordial gods sublimed, and through a maze they both raced, watching each other as they paced, to solve who would be in charge of all creation, who would rise to the ultimate celestial station? "The Primordial Maze" is a 2D puzzle game where the good needs to outsmart the evil

This game was a part of Global Game Jam 2022, held during January 2022.

It is the third game I have made as a solo developer from start to finish!
